title: Geri Horner cuts a sophisticated figure in a chic all white ensemble
text:
She recently took to the runway during the L'Oréal Paris Le Défilé show.

And Geri Horner was showcasing her style credentials once again as she attended the premiere for the His Dark Materials with producer Laurie Borg at the BFI Southbank, London, on Tuesday.

The Spice Girls' singer, 47, looked impossibly chic in a sophisticated white trench coat which she wore belted around her svelte midriff.

Glam: Geri Horner was showcasing her style credentials once again as she attended the premiere for the His Dark Materials with producer Laurie Borg at the BFI Southbank, London, on Tuesday

She teamed the garment with a pair of wide-legged trousers in a similar hue, while inching out from underneath were a pair of white court shoes.

The songstress carried her belongings in a boxy white Prada bag, while adding simple accessories including a pair of dainty black studded earrings.

The star swept her flame hued tresses into a chic chignon, and added light touches of make-up to her pretty visage including a coral lip.

Stylish: The Spice Girls' singer, 47, looked impossibly chic in a sophisticated white trench coat which she wore belted around her svelte midriff

Meanwhile, Laurie, who is executive producer of His Dark Materials, looked dapper in a dark grey tweed suit which he styled with a pale blue shirt and navy tie.

The trilogy, which follows Northern Lights, The Subtle Knife and The Amber Spyglass, will star Dafne as heroine Lyra who will be joined by James McAvoy, Ruth and Lin-Manuel Miranda.

The series, which is set on a parallel Earth, focuses on humans' whose souls exist within creatures known as daemons and take the form of animals.

Pretty: The star swept her flame hued tresses into a chic chignon, and added light touches of make-up to her pretty visage including a coral lip.

It will follow the heroine Lyra as she hunts for answers after her friends disappear following encounters with beings known as The Gobblers.

Amid her search for the truth, Lyra is taken into the care of Marisa Coulter [Ruth Wilson] who is linked to her uncle, Lord Asriel [James McAvoy].

After being gifted a device called the Alethiometer by the Master of Jordan College where she lives, Lyra begins her hunt for her friends.

His Dark Materials is set to air on BBC1 on November 3 2019
